title: Burning Secrets: Nashville Immortals Book Three
description: Dragons, deceit, and heat!Cricket Jones thought she'd faced it allâ€”from her daughter's traumatic ordeal with a devious vampire to her own clash with a raging alpha werewolf. But the calm in Bitter End is shattered when Aiden, a secretive dragon-shifter on a quest to find a mysterious 'antique,' arrives, setting off every alarm in Cricket's Revealer arsenal.There's something sinister about Aiden, but he's charmed everyone, including her Reaper friend Essie, and her boyfriend, Zeb. As loved ones start vanishing, Cricket is thrust into a web of deception and secrets. To save those she holds dear, Cricket might have to confront the dragon's fury and unlock the depths of her powers she never knew she had.Can Cricket dare to face the fire, or will the dragon's flames consume everyone she loves?If you're a fan of sassy female main characters, hilarious banter, and steamy love triangles, you won't want to miss this clever and original series! Scroll up to grab your copy of this entertaining and passionate paranormal women's fiction romance today!
author: Shauna Jared
